price: 97 même si tous les signes étaient produits sous leurs yeux, tant qu’ils ne verront pas le châtiment douloureux.
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaw jāathum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
